subject: Fwd: Axiom - Progress Update
preview: Thanks Reinhard, We are working through these and will keep you updated.

full_threads.body:
Thanks Reinhard, 

We are working through these and will keep you updated.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

Please find videos below to appear on the video listing page as requested by your dev team in the client feedback document. The video listing will be going ahead. The client have however mentioned another direction they want to take with regards to the services section of the website and we will hold a meeting about that today to see what the impact of this change will be. We will keep you updated on this.
Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Reinhard Kirchner <reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au>>
Date: Mon, Apr 1, 2019 at 3:41 PM
Subject: Re: Axiom - Progress Update
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Cc: Zoe Palmer <zoe@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:zoe@brandchemistry.com.au>>, Jaime Schell <jaime@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:jaime@brandchemistry.com.au>>


Sarah-Jane got back to me with some of the videos she wants to display on Video listing page. Please see her message (In red) below with links to each of the videos:

Videos - Can you please provide us with links to all video that will need to be displayed in the listing as well as the category/filter they need to appear under:
I’m not sure if you require the mp4 files or the vimeo links but if it is the links you require then:
Coleman Greig: https://vimeo.com/323985056 <https://vimeo.com/323985056> (Legal)
Nutrimetics: https://vimeo.com/323978903 <https://vimeo.com/323978903> (Consumer goods)
McGrath Foundation: https://vimeo.com/286124975 <https://vimeo.com/286124975> (NFP)
hipages: https://vimeo.com/272307871 <https://vimeo.com/272307871> (Professional services)
1-Stop Connections: https://vimeo.com/311376741 <https://vimeo.com/311376741> (Technology)
ELMO: https://vimeo.com/291610880 <https://vimeo.com/291610880> (Technology)
Kerwin Rae: https://vimeo.com/324917163 <https://vimeo.com/324917163> (Professional services)
Axiom video so far is out of date and has to be re-done
Filter categories - Please can you provide us with a list of the category filters that needs to be used for the video listing? I don’t think we have enough videos to turn on the filters yet
Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406

Speak soon,

Heath Maguire

On 1 Apr 2019, at 2:44 pm, Reinhard Kirchner <reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au>> wrote:

> Hi Heath
>
> I have gone through the developed pages and provided comments and screenshots in this QA document here:
> https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GGu27hJvCBXgnKqB9soChoYVgISCpHjedzJSZOK7pGc/edit#gid=1048977753 <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GGu27hJvCBXgnKqB9soChoYVgISCpHjedzJSZOK7pGc/edit#gid=1048977753>
>
> Please let me know if you do not have access if anything in the document is unclear. You will see each issues has been logged and priority assigned to it with a description. This will be a living document and be referenced regularly so it would great if we can keep this document up to date to track which issues has been fixed for future reference.
>
> Thanks.
> Kind Regards,
>
> Reinhard Kirchner
> Studio Lead
> +61 415 413 406

> On Thu, Mar 28, 2019 at 6:18 PM Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
> Hi Reinhard,
>
> As promised, here are the items that we have coded:
>
> Video page and pop up:
> https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-videos/ <https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-videos/>
>
> Our process page:
> https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-process/ <https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-process/>
>
> Our services page:
> https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-services/ <https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-services/>
>
> Why Axiom?
> https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-impact/ <https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-impact/> (just the menu item name change)
>
> Home
> https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/ <https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/>
>
> We just have the our work section to tackle now, pending your feedback on the above and any responsive tweaks.
>
> One thing to note, we have used the current sites styling for things like h1’s, h2’s, p etc. These differ slightly to your XD designs, but I was hesitant to introduce new styles for some pages and not others. Keen to hear your thoughts on this though.
>
> Thanks and speak soon!
>
> HEATH MAGUIRE
> CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
